c301.AdventureBook

Class EditStoryActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • c301.AdventureBook.EditStoryActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EditStoryActivity
extends Activity
implements Serializable
    The edit story activity allows the author to edit the contents of a story by adding or removing story fragments.
    Author:
    Justin
